summary: This is an email correspondence between attorneys Bobbi C. Sternheim and others regarding the drafting and filing of a joint submission letter in the case of U.S. v. Maxwell. The email discusses a deadline for filing the letter and includes a standard confidentiality notice.

events.title: Drafting of Joint Submission Letter
events.description: Attorneys correspond about reviewing, revising, and filing a joint submission letter per court order in the U.S. v. Maxwell case, with a planned filing deadline of 7:30 PM.

locations: West 19th Street office (Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim)
keyFacts: The document is legal correspondence from December 1, 2020, regarding the case U.S. v. Maxwell.
Attorneys are preparing a 'joint submission' letter as ordered by the court.
The correspondence indicates a planned filing deadline of 7:30 PM on December 1, 2020.
The email includes a confidentiality notice and mentions remote work due to Covid-19.
